titles.title: Susquehanna Gateway National Heritage Area Act
A bill to establish the Susquehanna Gateway National Heritage Area in the State of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 9/26/2008--Introduced. Susquehanna Gateway National Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Susquehanna Gateway National Heritage Area in Pennsylvania. Designates the Lancaster-York Heritage Region as the management entity for the Area. Requires the Lancaster-York Heritage Region to prepare and submit a management plan for the Area.
